root.name: screenHeight
root.description:
System variable that stores the height of the computer screen. For example, if the current screen resolution is 1024x768, screenHeight is 768. This dimension is useful when exporting full-screen applications.

To ensure that the sketch fills the entire screen, use "Present" instead of "Run." Otherwise, the window will still have a frame border around it and will not be placed in the upper corner of the screen. On Mac OS X, the menu bar will remain present unless "Present" mode is used.
